long_description: no.1 engineering testing services & maintenance consultancy firm in the power sector. powertest asia was established in 1995 by mr. since the company's inception, powertest asia has been providing testing services worldwide to original equipment manufactures (oems) of power equipment, utilities, and service providers in power & industry sectors. powertest asia is not allied with any manufacturer or repair work shop and prides itself on delivering only the true facts to its customers. pta undertakes third party quality inspection consultancy (tpqi) of all government & private power industry and oil sectors in electrical / mechanical works. pta offers failure analysis services in support of our client's need to achieve high quality. analysis based on operational history and the other data based on periodic examination of critical components. pta is specialized for rla assessment. with our core team of experts, we have access to almost all types of designs. learning at pta is learner-centric, aligned to business goals and customer needs and to maintain quality.
generated_description: powertest asia, legally known as powertest asia pvt. ltd., is a company based in hyderabad, telangana, india. the company provides a comprehensive range of diagnostic testing services for electrical power equipment and turbines. powertest asia serves original equipment manufacturers (oems) of power equipment, utilities, and service providers in the power and industry sectors. the company is iso 9001 certified and offers services such as cable diagnostic tests, eclid testing, partial discharge testing, transformer testing, motor diagnostic testing, and more. powertest asia operates globally, supporting clients in india, the middle east, south and east asia, africa, and south america. the company is known for its highly skilled professional staff and commitment to delivering unbiased diagnostic test results.
